actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to waive the statute of limitations with regard to the tort claim of David E. Janney against the United States.

summary.text: Waives the statute of limitations with regard to any action for damages filed within six months of enactment by a certain individual for injuries sustained by him as a result of the diagnosis and treatment he received at a certain Air Force hospital.

titles.title: A bill to waive the statute of limitations with regard to the tort claim of David E. Janney against the United States.
